mods.abstract: Three color window card (black, brown, and red on white) announcing the Second Annual Nashville River Stages featuring Bare Jr., Bela Fleck and the Flecktones, Ben Harper, B*Witched, Bloque, Burlap to Cashmere, Cheap Trick, Corey Harris, Cottonmouth Kings, Dirty Dozen Brass Band, Dovetail Joint, Everclear, George Thorogood and the Destroyers, Hole, Hootie and the Blowfish, Isaac Hayes, Jessica Simpson, Joe Ely, Jonny Lang, Judson Spence, KC and the Sunshine Band, Kent, My Friend Steve, Nat Hemby, 98 Degrees, Patty Griffin, Robin Trower, Shootyz Groove, Soul Coughing, Steve Earle and the Del McCoury Band, Tin Star, Todd Snider, 2 Skinnee J's, Train, and Wilco in downtown Nashville, Tennessee from April 30 to May 2. Poster features a woodcut of the Nashville skyline.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
